Abydos High School
in Abydos
Abydos Closed School Countermeasures Committee
Huh, let's do it properly. Because comfort is important~ (Hoshino Takanashi)
glory of the old days
Upon completion of construction of buildings and World Wonders, gain [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 15% of the construction cost.
masked swimsuit

Gain [ICON_Gold] 300 gold for capturing cities and destroying barbarian encampments. [NEWLINE] Winning a battle gains [ICON_Gold] gold equal to 50% of the defeated enemy's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Shiroko Sand Wolf, a second-year student of the Abydos Countermeasures Committee. nice to meet you.

Saint Nephthys
Unique district of Abydos. Replace commercial hubs. Reduces the [ICON_Gold] purchase cost of units, buildings and districts in this city by 20%.
Saint Nephthys Office
Unique building of Abydos. Replace stock exchanges. +15% to [ICON_Gold] gold production in this city.
Shiroko: N, Abydos Countermeasures Committee second-year student, Sand Wolf Shiroko. Nice to meet you.
The Countermeasures Committee has invited you to your own city (if you accept, the location of the other country's nearby city will be revealed).
Invited task force to home city.
The Task Force proposes a map exchange.
Ayane: What kind of work are you doing today?
Hoshino: "Do you need me? Huh, thank you for your compliments. Huh? Isn't that flattering? Ah, uh, uh... ah, thank you."
Nonomi: "Uh... I'm sorry..." (The declaration of friendship was rejected.)
Shiroko "Teacher, tell me more things I don't know."
Shiroko: "From the moment I met you, this place became even more special to me."
Celica: "Ugh...I'm sorry..." (Refused to declare friendship with the Countermeasures Committee)
Celica: "You guys. If you have time like that, do what you have to do!"
Celica: “I can’t forgive you!
Shiroko: "Okay, I'm going to the war."
Nonomi: "It's time for punishment. Please prepare yourself."
Hoshino "Let's take it easy together~" (The task force proposes peace negotiations)
Noonomi: "Hmm, that was the best fight."
Celica: "This is nothing." (Rejected peace)
Nonomi: "Everyone, thank you for your hard work."
Nonomi: "No, you can't be spoiled until after you're done with your work~" (Peace was refused)
Hoshino: "I lost. I didn't mean to do this..." (The countermeasures committee was defeated.)
Hoshino: "I lost. I didn't mean to do this..." (The countermeasures committee was defeated.)
Envoy accepted.

received envoys.
refused to accept envoys.

refused the alliance.

allowed to open borders.

The task force is satisfied with the terms of the deal.
The task force denied the request.
The task force accepted the request.
We have accepted the request from the Countermeasures Committee.
I refused the request from the countermeasures committee.
It met the task force's agenda.
Suitable for the task force's agenda of "emphasis on culture" (high cultural power)
Consistent with the task force's agenda of "emphasizing happiness" (high comfort)
Fits the Task Force's agenda "I love gold" (has a lot of gold income)
Fits task force agenda "heavy industrialists" (high productivity)
Fits task force agenda "alliance city-states" (not conflicting over city-state suzerainty)
Fits the task force's agenda "numberism" (large population)
Fits the Task Force's agenda "Technology Enthusiast" (high science)
Suitable for the Countermeasures Committee's agenda "standing army" (military strength is high)
Fits into the task force's agenda "survival of the fittest" (active in war)
Fits the Task Force's agenda "Spokesperson for great people" (few great people)
Fits the task force's agenda "heritage lovers" (less heritage)
Consistent with Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (active in protecting city-states)
Consistent with Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (active in protecting city-states)
Consistent with the Task Force's agenda "air power" (high air power)
Consistent with Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (active in protecting city-states)
Fits task force agenda 'civilized' (repulsed barbarian encampment)
Fits into task committee agenda 'environmentalists' (enthusiastic about nature conservation and building national parks)
Fits task force agenda 'developerist' (enthusiastic about logging and terrain improvement)
Consistent with the task force's "ideological constitution" (same government)
Consistent with the Task Force's agenda "New Happy" (proactive in the use of nuclear weapons)
Fits the Task Force's agenda "Piety" (High Faith)
Fits the task force's agenda "explorers" (low map completion)
Consistent with the task force's "paranoia" agenda (lack of military power and territorial expansion motivation)
It went against the task force's agenda.
Contrary to the task force's agenda "emphasis on culture" (low cultural ability)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "emphasis on happiness" (low comfort)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "I love gold" (low income from gold)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Allied City-States"
Contrary to the task force's agenda "heavy industrialist" (low productivity)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "number principle" (small population)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "Technologists" (low science)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "standby army" (military strength is low)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "paranoia" (military power and desire for territorial expansion are high)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "Spokesperson for great people" (many great people)
Contrary to the task force's agenda 'heritage lovers' (lots of heritage)
Contrary to Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Contrary to Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "air power" (air power is low)
Contrary to Task Force agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "civilized nations" (leaving barbarian camps unattended)
Against task committee agenda 'environmentalists' (destroying nature)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "developmentalist" (enthusiastic about nature conservation)
It went against the task force's agenda "ideological constitution" (different government)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Nuke happy" (passive toward nuclear attack)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Piety" (low Faith)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "explorers" (high degree of map completion)
The task force has promised you to stop colonizing near the border.
The countermeasures committee will ignore the warning and continue settlement activities near the border.
The Task Force has promised you not to take any military action.
The countermeasures committee is ignoring the warning and waiting for an opportunity to take military action.
The Task Force has promised you not to send spies.
The countermeasures committee ignored the warning and intends to continue spying.
The countermeasures committee has promised you not to steal the treasure.
The Countermeasures Committee ignored the warning and plans to continue looting hidden treasures.
The Countermeasures Committee has promised you to stop proselytizing.
The countermeasures committee will ignore the warning and continue its missionary work.
The task force is asking you to commit to the following: Do not settle near our borders.
I made an appointment with the Task Force.
I refused my promise.
The task force is asking you to commit to the following: Do not attack with troops near the border.
I made an appointment with the Task Force.
The task force is asking you to make the following commitments: Do not send spies.
I made an appointment with the Task Force.
I refused my promise.
The task force is asking you to make the following commitments: Do not loot hidden treasures.
I made an appointment with the Task Force.
I refused my promise.
The task force is asking you to make the following commitments: Stop missionary activities.
I made an appointment with the Task Force.
I refused my promise.
The Task Force seeks to continue the alliance.
I agreed to continue the alliance with the Task Force.
Refused to continue the alliance with the Countermeasures Committee.
The continuation of the alliance has been accepted.
The continuation of the alliance was refused.
Consistent with the task force's agenda "gossip" (proactive in declaration of friendship, opening of borders, dispatch of envoys, establishment of embassies)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "gossip" (reluctant to declare friendship, open borders, dispatch envoys, establish embassies)
Meeting the task force's agenda of "follow-up" (meaning a golden age)
It went against the task force's agenda to "follow" (falling into the dark ages)
Fulfilled the task force's agenda "Humanist" (falling into the dark ages)
It went against the task force's agenda of "humanists" (meaning a golden age)
Fits the task force's agenda "territorial expansionist" (territory is large)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "territorial expansionist" (territory is small)
Appropriate for the Task Force's agenda "flat Earth theorists" (negative about the space race)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Flat Earth Theorist" (active in the space race)
Fits the task force agenda "Great White Fleet" (Navy is strong)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "Great White Fleet" (weak navy)
Fits the task force's "demagogue" agenda (low diplomatic support)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "demagogue" (high diplomatic support)
Suitable for the task force's agenda "Tourism Nation" (low tourism power)
Contrary to the task force's agenda "Tourism Nation" (High tourism power)
Fits the task force's agenda "religious intolerance" (same religion)
It went against the task force's agenda "religious intolerance" (different religion)
Fits the task force's "libertarian" agenda (fewer diplomatic victory points)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Libertarian" (more diplomatic victory points)
Fits task committee agenda "looters" (lots of looted tiles)
Contrary to task committee agenda 'looters' (fewer tiles looted)
Fits Task Force agenda "Bear Enclosure" (not conquering another civilization's capital)
Contrary to Task Force agenda "Bear Enclosure" (conquering another civilization's capital)
Fits task force agenda "zealots" (follows religion founded by task force)
Contrary to Task Force agenda "zealots" (does not follow religion founded by task force)
Fits the task force's agenda "miser" (high gold income)
Contrary to the Task Force's agenda "Miserable" (less gold income)
